Our MasterPeace club in Denmark is connected to the Necessary Teacher Training College. A school that beliefs in doing it differently. 😍😎 We love different. We love new. Here, you can watch a video about their way of teaching. https://buff.ly/2w0SHy8

An amazing project just kicked-off in Afghanistan! #Education_Project 🎓Phase one: finding out why people drop out of school or are not continuing their education. 📙💰✒️#Peace_comes from #Education pic.twitter.com/abjlMi2Bwe

We are currently living in a world with over 1.8 billion people between the age of 10 - 24, and due to better education and a more interconnected world they are becoming one of the most aware generation that our world has ever known. And we are feeling their energy ✨🎉🕊️ pic.twitter.com/eiDGbZthg1

MasterPeace is proud to organize the 5th edition of the Great Minds Meeting. World population has reached 7.5 billion. We believe that they are 7.5 billion potential talents! To unleash all potential our mission is to create a sustainable future to all. 😄 https://buff.ly/2M7nsfS
